titleStmt.title: A dissuasive from murmuring Being a sermon on 1 Cor. X. 10. Preached by Sam. Carte, M.A. Imprimatur, May 14. 1694. Geo. Royse.
titleStmt.author: Carte, Samuel, 1653-1740.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Richard Baldwin, near the Oxford-Arms in Warwick-Lane,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
